meanings.definition: The development or course of development of an individual organism.
meanings.sent1: The ontogenies of a butterfly show its transformation from a caterpillar to a beautiful insect.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ontogenies of various animals to understand their growth processes.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in laughter when the teacher explained the ontogenies of a tadpole turning into a frog.
meanings.sent4: The ontogenies of a seed growing into a tree mirror the stages of human life.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the ontogenies of plants can be fascinating and enlightening.

meanings.definition: The origin and development of an individual organism from embryo to adult.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the ontogenies of a chick helps us comprehend how it hatches from an egg and grows into a chicken.
meanings.sent2: The ontogenies of a human being involve the journey from a tiny embryo to a fully grown adult.
meanings.sent3: The movie depicted the ontogenies of a superhero from a baby to a powerful crime-fighter.
meanings.sent4: The ontogenies of a story character can be as intriguing as the growth of a real-life organism.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the ontogenies of a butterfly in person is a magical experience.
